creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: set of Fuchi-Kashira of a cat and rats; .1  decorated with one maise sitting on a gold-colored broom on front, another mouse on back; oval opening on top, semi-rectangular opening on bottom; .2  decorated with gold-colored cat; rectangular openings on 2 sides, oval opening on back; both in one wood box w/ purple lining
title: Knife hilt and finial
